summary: Frontend testing of 5 new UI pages completed successfully. All pages load correctly with proper data-testid attributes, navigation links in sidebar, and functional dialogs/forms.

tests: Page loads with data-testid='recurring-expenses-page'
Status filter dropdown works (All/Active/Stopped)
Generate Due button triggers generation and shows toast 'Generated X expenses'
New Recurring dialog opens with all form fields (Name, Account, Vendor, Amount, Tax%, Frequency, Repeat Every, Start/End Date, Never Expires toggle, Description)
Table displays recurring expenses with columns: Name, Account, Vendor, Frequency, Amount, Next Date, Status, Generated, Actions
Stop/Resume/Delete action buttons present
Page loads with data-testid='project-tasks-page'
Project selector dropdown works
Project info card shows selected project details (name, customer, status, budget, task count)
New Task dialog opens with form fields (Task Name, Description, Hourly Rate, Budget Hours, Billable toggle)
Task creation works - toast shows 'Task created'
New task appears in table with correct data
Table shows: Task Name, Description, Rate, Budget Hours, Logged Hours, Progress bar, Billable badge, Edit/Delete actions
Page loads with data-testid='opening-balances-page'
3 tabs present: Customers, Vendors, Accounts (all with data-testid)
Tab switching works correctly
Summary cards show: Total Entries, Total Debit, Total Credit
Set Opening Balance dialog opens with fields (Entity Type, Entity Select, Opening Balance, As of Date, Notes)
Table displays opening balances with Dr/Cr indicators
Page loads with data-testid='exchange-rates-page'
Currency rate cards display latest rates (USD/INR shown)
Currency filter dropdown works
Add Rate dialog opens with fields (From Currency, To Currency, Rate, Effective Date)
Exchange Rate Preview shows live calculation (1 $ = X ₹)
Rate creation works - toast shows 'Exchange rate set successfully'
History table shows all rates sorted by effective date
Page loads with data-testid='activity-logs-page'
4 stats cards: Total Activities, Created, Updated, Deleted
Entity type filter works with 13 options (Invoice, Bill, Expense, Contact, Customer, Vendor, Item, Payment, Project, Estimate, Credit Note, Journal)
Filter selection updates displayed logs
Empty state shows appropriate message when no logs
Recurring Expenses link in Finance section
Opening Balances link in Finance section
Exchange Rates link in Finance section
Project Tasks link in Projects section
Activity Logs link in Administration section
All 5 nav links have correct data-testid attributes

critical_code_review_comments: All 5 pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
All dialogs have Cancel and Save buttons with proper data-testid
Form validation works (required fields checked before submission)
Toast notifications show success/error messages appropriately
Loading states with spinner shown while fetching data
Empty states with helpful messages when no data
Tables have proper column headers and data formatting
Currency formatting uses Indian Rupee format (₹X,XXX.XX)
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Task_UI_Test task in Project Tasks page, Added exchange rate USD/INR 85.50 in Exchange Rates page
context_for_next_testing_agent: 5 new frontend pages fully tested and working: /recurring-expenses, /project-tasks, /opening-balances, /exchange-rates, /activity-logs. All pages use existing backend APIs (/zoho/recurring-expenses, /zoho/projects/{id}/tasks, /zoho/opening-balances, /zoho/settings/exchange-rates, /zoho/activity-logs). Navigation links added to sidebar under Finance, Projects, and Administration sections. All interactive elements have data-testid attributes. Test data created: TEST_Task_UI_Test task, USD/INR rate 85.50.
